answers.answer: I was started on metformin er (500 mg) and my blood sugars were under 200.  I also have a thyroid problem.  Wish I could be of more help.  It sounds like your not totally comfortable with your doctor.

My husbands sugars were well under 200 and he was put on medication.I'd ask to see an endocrinologist for an opinion.  What are your husbands fasting blood sugars?  What are his post meal blood sugars?  Just to say they run from 126 to 182 doesn't really mean much.

Fasting glucose(8 hours without food or carbohydrates) greater than 120is when a person is declared a diabetic.Even then,it is sometimes possibleto control glucose level with diet and exercise.Prrolonged glucose levels greaterthan 150 are harmful.Eddie

question: My husband is type 2 diabetes and has been able to control it without medication, but they recently found that he also has a thyroid issue and put him on synthroid 100mcga day and his blood sugar levels have been running any where from 126 to 182. The doctor said that they don't usually start meds until the levels start running in the 200. Does this sound right or should we seek a second opinion.
title: meds
